data.text: @Ocugen @US_FDA You need to inform your investors leading to this denial!
@MrcioLG1 @Ocugen @US_FDA @FDA How long would this case run? The FDA have a bottomless pit of money, do we? It’s a no from me. Pick your battles.

@MrcioLG1 @Ocugen @US_FDA @FDA Just my humble opinion…I’m assuming this court case will be fought in PA? What’s the States position/attitude on masks, vaccines and Covid? Further more court cases and share prices are NOT mutually exclusive - chew on that.
@Ocugen @US_FDA #Covaxin rejected 2 times $Ocugen against mrna vaccines full of risks.Should @ocugen take @FDA to court?

@Ocugen @US_FDA Is there a reason you can't tell us why the FDA denied EUA? Is it legal reasons, state it, if not tell us why it's denied. It's pretty incompetent that you guys either don't give updates or reassurance to investors. If you legally can't speak on it say you can't speak on it.

@cashtano @nodude504_fox @HieuTrantheMAN @Ocugen @US_FDA @DrCaliff_FDA anyone in ocgn at this point knew this was gonna happen we’re in  for Canada and added territory’s and manufacturing for @BharatBiotech we knew @US_FDA @FDACommissioner @DrWoodcockFDA @DrCaliff_FDA was gonna deny us cause them to lose $ let’s pray @GovCanHealth approves #covaxin https://t.co/LLKUQSetea

@nodude504_fox @HieuTrantheMAN @Ocugen @US_FDA @DrCaliff_FDA It seems like the most realistic timeline considering they have only done one phase. Only got clearance for next 2 in IND, then comes BLA, then comes phase 4, then if approved manufacturing, distribution, and sales start to driving factors of this vaccine. They are just starting
